channel.title: Best for begining
channel.description:
Hey everybody.
Firs of all, I want to say that I'm new to RSPS. I'm searching for a server easy to code like 317, but with good graphics. I want it to be nice and done. I like delta, but its graphics sucks. Please recommend me something :]

item.title: Best for begining
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Shadowspkin:

PI, of course just get one loading 603 animations and what not. There’s alot of them now I suggest not getting one of the Erased Pkz client’s the server+client is nice but the client suckz balls for loading takes like 5 min’s to load the cache. I would use Oricale-x client and make it compatible with another server ^_^. Good luck moving from Delta. Delta is like being level 1 and then everything else is like being level 50+ depending on what your making so its really challenging. Good luck learning

There really isn’t a ‘level’ for different sources. Java is Java. They’re just packaged differently. Delta just so happens to have everything in the client class.

Read full topic
